mapper.select: select count(1) totalCount from ( SELECT a.ID postTypeId, a.TYPE_IMTG_URL postTypeImg, a.TYPE_NAME postTypeName, a.SORT_TIME sortTime FROM t_post_type a WHERE a.IS_DEL=0 ) g
SELECT a.ID postTypeId, a.TYPE_IMTG_URL postTypeImg, a.TYPE_NAME postTypeName, a.SORT_TIME sortTime FROM t_post_type a WHERE a.IS_DEL=0 ORDER BY sortTime LIMIT 8
mapper.insert: INSERT t_post_type ( TYPE_IMTG_URL, TYPE_NAME, CREATE_TIME, SORT_TIME ) VALUES( #{postTypeImg}, #{postTypeName}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_post_type a SET a.IS_DEL = 1 WHERE a.ID = #{postTypeId}
